# DoraTech

> DoraTech (成都多纳科技有限公司) is an AI technology company based in Chengdu, China. We build AI-powered applications that combine artificial intelligence with human-centered design. Our flagship product is Dora, an AI astrologer and emotional healing companion.

## Products

- [Dora](https://doratech.cn/apps/dora.html): AI-powered astrologer and emotional healing companion app. Features natal chart analysis, daily horoscopes, personality insights, and 24/7 AI chat support. Available on iOS and Android.

## Company

- [About DoraTech](https://doratech.cn/): Official website — company overview, mission, and product showcase.
- [Privacy Policy](https://doratech.cn/privacy.html): How we collect, use, and protect user data. Bilingual (Chinese/English).
- [Terms of Service](https://doratech.cn/terms.html): User agreement and service terms. Bilingual (Chinese/English).
